response: I will recommend these workshops to all of my friends! So we can make the world a better place
Thank you for this nice workshop!

The last day a lot of questions were shut down with "this is not a statistics course" - I felt that was really good. The first two days there were quite a few questions we spent time discussing that kind of went on a tangent. One example was how to round the numbers in the descriptive table. Could have just said "there are many ways - we will do what the course material says". Sometimes questions are good and relevant for many people, but sometimes they are just distracting. I feel the instructors in general could be better at distinguishing which questions need to be shut down and which bring fruitful discussions to the course.
Thank you all for this great course !
For each section it could be good to describe the overall goal and what is aimed to produce in the given section.

I am not sure all instructors followed the guidelines described on the website when presenting and showing codes, and maybe it would be good for them to also do precourse tasks to set everything up. I was a bit confused sometimes.I really appreciate everything I learned and am looking forward to using it in my work. Thank you for a very rewarding course/workshop.
